pullrequest.title: Show and Revoke permissions in User Metrics

content.raw:
just a suggestion: to pass `this.selectedMetric` as argument to the function (and use that argument value in the function instead of this.selectedMetric) . 
This would be needed to avoid potential, let's say, "concurrent" changes to `this.selectedMetric` that could lead to undesired effects.
content.html: just a suggestion: to pass this.selectedMetric as argument to the function (and use that argument value in the function instead of this.selectedMetric) . This would be needed to avoid potential, let's say, "concurrent" changes to this.selectedMetric that could lead to undesired effects.
